r.s: Sundown is a fast, robust Markdown parsing library for PHP5
r.d:
Sundown is a fast, robust Markdown parsing library, originally created by Natacha PortÃ© and improved Vicent Marti. this extension inspired Redcarpet ruby extension which created by Vicent.
PECL Sundown provides straight forward object oriented Markdown API and customizable Renders.
r.n:
bumped up 0.3.0
change callback method name for PECL standards. php-sundown aims to implement more test cases until next minor version release.
[summary] * change callback method names for PECL standards * fix segfault when using XHTML render * fix getting render flags issue * improve Sundown\Markdown don'd read render / extensions property directly. * fix memory leaks * implement more test cases.
